label: statedCondition
comment: A stated condition of these transported dangerous goods.

rangeIncludes.comment: A state, such as of a specified person or thing.

domainIncludes.comment: A self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes, such as a box or a barrel which can be filled, partially filled or empty.,A referenced self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes.
